MetaData.ProjectTemplate:
DCAF Linux Shared Memory Example Implements C and DCAF based LVRT applications that run in parallel on an NI Linux RT cRIO target, sharing I/O tag data between them using Linux shared memory. Sample Projects:CompactRIO Linux;shared memory;real-time;RT;cRIO;CompactRIO DCAF Linux Shared Memory Example source/LV/DCAF Linux Shared Memory Example.lvproj> images/SharedMemoryAndDCAF.png None
